title: Rates of forward and reverse rxn after adding I2

content.prompt: Which of the following best describes what will happen to the reaction immediately after additional iodine gas is added to the system?

choices.label: The rates of both the forward and reverse reactions decrease.
The rates of both the forward and reverse reactions do not change.
The rate of the forward reaction becomes greater than the rate of the reverse reaction.
The rate of the forward reaction becomes less than the rate of the reverse reaction.

skill.text: 4.A: Predict and/or explain chemical properties or phenomena (e.g., of atoms or molecules) using given chemical theories, models, and representations.
